akn:content.akn:p: (a) Annual reports to Congress Not later than March 31 of each calendar year, the Secretary shall submit to the Committee on Energy and Commerce of the House of Representatives and the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions of the Senate a report, with respect to the preceding calendar year, on drug shortages that—

(b) Trend analysis The Secretary is authorized to retain a third party to conduct a study, if the Secretary believes such a study would help clarify the causes, trends, or solutions related to drug shortages.
(c) Definition In this section, the term “drug shortage” or “shortage” has the meaning given such term in section 356c of this title.
